description: In this topic, you will learn how to discuss about the movie that you watched and where did you watch it? Describe why do you want to share it with your friends? Ask someone about his/her favorite movie.
name: Movies
Clothes
description: In this topic, you will learn how to describe your clothes, share your styles and preferences, as well as ask someone about his/her closet.

name: Weekend activities
description: In this topic, you will learn how to share your weekend's activities, describe the ideal weekend and ask someone about his/her weekend.

In this topic, you will learn how to share with your friend about your favorite food or famous food in your country, why you love that food and what is special about it? Describe your first time you tried it.
name: Food
